Hey!\""},{"lineNumber":17257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes?\""},{"lineNumber":17258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様だが。入っていいかー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's me. Can I come in?\""},{"lineNumber":17259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、どうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, go ahead.\""},{"lineNumber":17260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、あっさり。では…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, so easily. Well then...\""},{"lineNumber":17261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa?\""},{"lineNumber":17262,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋の中は雑然として、","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the disorderly."},{"lineNumber":17264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is...\""},{"lineNumber":17265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相当荒れたみたいね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Looks like it's been pretty messed up...\""},{"lineNumber":17266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、散らかしていて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry for the mess...\""},{"lineNumber":17267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、用向きというのは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what was it you glanced briefly at Maria."},{"lineNumber":17272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなクズに心を痛める必要はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don't need to worry about such a scumbag."},{"lineNumber":17273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どーんと俺様にだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just come boldly to me...\""},{"lineNumber":17274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ。私、知っていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No. I knew.\""},{"lineNumber":17275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":17276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの人に家族がいるというのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That he after what the factory manager said, I properly thought about it.\""},{"lineNumber":17281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう。どうするんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":17282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「脅迫します」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will blackmail him.\""},{"lineNumber":17283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………へっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Heh.\""},{"lineNumber":17284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私とあの人のこれからを、全て撮影、録音します。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will record and film everything from now on between me and that person."},{"lineNumber":17285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの人が、私を裏切ろうとしたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If he tries to betray me,"},{"lineNumber":17286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを…………ご家族に渡す、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will... give those recordings to his family.\""},{"lineNumber":17287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek...!\""},{"lineNumber":17288,"originalJapaneseLine":"カスミは平然と……あるいは淡々と、","translatedEnglishLine":"Kasumi, calmly... or rather, matter-of-factly,"},{"lineNumber":17289,"originalJapaneseLine":"目つきだけ鋭く、ランスを見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"looked sharply at Rance."},{"lineNumber":17290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その為に、ラレラレ石を隠して使えるよう、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For that reason, I've hidden the Rarerare stone so I can use it,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 制御が効かないものだから……仕方ないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are things you can't control... so it can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言える台詞が、聞き覚えのある言葉ばっかりなのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the phrases I can say are all words I've heard before,
which makes me feel so self-loathing...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……志津香もこんな気分だったのかなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I wonder if Shizuka felt this way too...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　志津香がどうしたって？」
それより、そういう事で、困っちゃって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, I'm troubled because of something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしたら、工場の運営に支障が来るかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it could interfere with the factory operation..."
"Indeed. If you make me fall in love,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 問題は万事解決だがな」
「カスミの部屋はここか。おーい」
部屋の中は雑然として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the room, it was messy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無秩序に工具類などが放置されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with tools and such left disorderly.
"Looks like it's been pretty messed up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、散らかしていて……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what was it you needed...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君がおっさんに騙されているという話だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about the story that some old man is deceiving you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちらりと、カスミがマリアに視線を送る。
「そんなクズに心を痛める必要はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't need to worry about such a scumbag.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの人に家族がいるというのは、
なんとなく……分かってましたし、
ずっと一緒にいたい、とか言うのも嘘だな、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that saying he wanted to be with me forever was a lie."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも。工場長に言われて、ちゃんと考えました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But after what the factory manager said, I properly thought about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私とあの人のこれからを、全て撮影、録音します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will record and film everything from now on between me and that person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの人が、私を裏切ろうとしたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If he tries to betray me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを…………ご家族に渡す、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will... give those recordings to his family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスミは平然と……あるいは淡々と、
目つきだけ鋭く、ランスを見た。
「その為に、ラレラレ石を隠して使えるよう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that reason, I've hidden the Rarerare stone so I can use it,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
